sentences.english: The bark of cinnamon trees, brown in color.
sentences.chinese: 桂树的皮，外皮粗糙呈现褐色。

sentences.english: In China, spring rolls are small witha thin, delicate wrapper.
sentences.chinese: 在中国，春卷是一道外皮小而薄，美味绝口。

sentences.english: Discard the bacon rind and cut each rasher in half.
sentences.chinese: 去掉熏肉的外皮，再把每一片熏肉切成两半。

sentences.english: Skin made by the metal and liner made by double-glazing.
sentences.chinese: 外皮由铁皮制成，内装双层玻璃制成的瓶胆。

sentences.english: They must have appeared first as crusts and clinkers .
sentences.chinese: 它们最初必然象面包的外皮和熔炉里的渣块。

sentences.english: This method is propitious for the analysis of all kinds of cortically induced current.
sentences.chinese: 该方法适合分析各种电缆的外皮感应电流。

sentences.english: She picked up the purse and pointed to the steel YSL on the flap.
sentences.chinese: 她拿起钱包指了指外皮上的“YSL”金属标志。

sentences.english: Crusted lesions were seen on all skin surface.
sentences.chinese: 在皮肤表面，可以看到外皮痂形成的病变。

sentences.english: When cool enough to handle, slip off the skins and cut the beets into pieces.
sentences.chinese: 当甜菜凉后，把外皮拨下，并且把甜菜切成小段。

sentences.english: Peel the grapefruit, remove the film layer and only keep the inside flesh then tear into little pieces;
sentences.chinese: 大柚子去外皮后，再去掉瓣上的薄皮掰成小块。

sentences.english: How can we remove the husk of the grains?
sentences.chinese: 我们怎样去掉谷物的外皮？

sentences.english: Now after improving, changing parts of spare partses it also can take off the cortex of small almond.
sentences.chinese: 现经改良，更换部分零件后，可以脱小杏仁的外皮。

sentences.english: Pruritis, papules, pustules, crusts and scabs.
sentences.chinese: 搔痒，丘疹，脓疱，外皮坚硬并结痂。

sentences.english: This yellow crust is a sponge, in thephylum Porifera.
sentences.chinese: 这片黄色的外皮是海绵，属于海绵动物门。

sentences.english: Using a sharp knife, cut away the pith and peel from both fruits.
sentences.chinese: 用一把锋利的刀削去两种水果的外皮和中果皮。

definition: crispy/thin and brittle/a crispy fried cracker
loose (soil, or limbs of a relaxed person etc)/flaky (pastry etc)
